message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. It's worth at least $1,000,000 to me, and I know it holds the same value for you. I'm offering it to you for $1,050,000. This price allows me a small profit while still providing you with a fantastic deal. Consider this a gesture of good faith, as I'm confident this product will be a significant asset to your endeavors. Let me know your decision.
